title: TechStuff Classic: The Biggest Lawsuits in Gaming History
itunes:title: TechStuff Classic: The Biggest Lawsuits in Gaming History
description:
CNET's Iyaz Akhtar joins the show to talk about lawsuits. What are some of the biggest lawsuits in gaming and how have they shaped our world?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
